name: RITTENHOUSE PLAZA, INC. v. Joan LICHTMAN v. Marvin Levin, C.P.A., Mary Duden, Stanton Oswald, Esquire, William Lederer, E. Gerald Riesenbach, Esquire, Jon Sirlin, Esquire, Dana Plon, Esquire and Peter Lesser, Esquire. Petition of Joan Lichtman

parties: RITTENHOUSE PLAZA, INC. v. Joan LICHTMAN v. Marvin Levin, C.P.A., Mary Duden, Stanton Oswald, Esquire, William Lederer, E. Gerald Riesenbach, Esquire, Jon Sirlin, Esquire, Dana Plon, Esquire and Peter Lesser, Esquire. Petition of Joan Lichtman.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of November, 2008, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition for Review, is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
960 A.2d 426

No. 123 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 5, 2008.
